body:
Following updates on the availability of a key figure in the Radiance
community (we won't mention any names) and requests from those
planning to attend PLEA 2006, the dates have been revised to 11-12
(Mon-Tues) September.

The previous options are no longer available -- apologies to those
who had already got back to me regarding their preferred date.

Updates and the provisional programme will be posted here:
http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/radiance2006work.html
Please check the page regularly.

Would those intending to give a presentation please send titles as
soon as possible - I will post details as soon as they are supplied.

I look forward to receiving your expressions of interest etc.

Regards,

-John

-----------------------------------------------
Dr. John Mardaljevic
Senior Research Fellow
Institute of Energy and Sustainable Development
De Montfort University
The Gateway
Leicester
LE1 9BH, UK
+44 (0) 116 257 7972
+44 (0) 116 257 7981 (fax)

jm@dmu.ac.uk

subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance 2006 Workshop: DATE CHANGED TO 11-12September
